tool.name: heatmap2

param.name: input1
param.label: Input should have column headers - these will be the columns that are plotted

tool.help: This tool will generate a histogram representing the distrinutions of each numerical column. Each column should have a descriptive header with no spaces, which will be used in the plot legend to represent the corresponding column (group). Input data example: ID Cond_A Cond_B gene_A 10 15 gene_B 8 12 gene_C 10 15 gene_D 6 9 gene_E 9 13.5 gene_F 8 12
